alert.note: Alert for Cannon; De Kalb; Putnam; Warren; White; Wilson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 30 at 8:01PM CDT until June 30 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... De Kalb County in Middle Tennessee... Northern Warren County in Middle Tennessee... Southeastern Wilson County in Middle Tennessee... Southwestern White County in Middle Tennessee... Southwestern Putnam County in Middle Tennessee... Northeastern Cannon County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 845 PM CDT. * At 801 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles south of Gordonsville, or 9 miles northwest of Smithville, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Smithville, Alexandria, Dowelltown, Liberty, Center Hill Lake, Rock Island State Park and Edgar Evans State Park. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 270 and 278. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.

area.areaDesc: Cannon; De Kalb; Putnam; Warren; White; Wilson
